subject: Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Qualifying for Sunday’s Nascar Sprint Cup race at Auto Club Speedway in Fontana, Calif., was rained out Friday, with the 43-car field determined by the rulebook. Car-owner points from the past season will determine the lineup, so the two-time reigning Cup champion Jimmie Johnson and his Hendrick Motorsports teammate Jeff Gordon, who finished second in 2007, will start from the front in the Auto Club 500.
